2.text: Wash the vegetables before peeling them, if necessary.

3.text: Chop or dice the vegetables into small sizes.

4.text: Add oil and seasoning to the veggies.

5.text: Toss the vegetables in the oil and seasoning so they’re evenly coated.

6.text: Prepare a metal baking sheet so the vegetables won't stick.

7.text: Give your vegetables plenty of space on the baking sheet.

8.text: Spread all of the veggies on one tray to cook them all at once.

9.text: Pair vegetables with similar cooking times together for better control.

10.text: Add vegetables to the baking sheet in stages to monitor their roasting.

11.text: Roast all of your vegetables individually for perfect roasting times.

12.text: Put the veggies in the oven once it has preheated.

13.text: Mix the vegetables with a spatula after 10-15 minutes.

14.text: Look for browned edges that indicate the veggies are roasted.

15.text: Pierce a vegetable with your fork to see if it’s done.
